variables.name: CONTENT_URI
variables.comment:
* The {@code content://} style URL for this table.
         * @hide

variables.name: ORIG_ROW_ID
variables.comment:
* Triggers on sms table create a row in this table for each update/delete. * This column is the "_id" of the row from sms table that was updated/deleted. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

* @hide

variables.name: SUB_ID
variables.comment:
* Triggers on sms table create a row in this table for each update/delete. * This column is the "sub_id" of the row from sms table that was updated/deleted. * @hide *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: TYPE
variables.comment:
* The type of operation that created this row. * {@link #TYPE_UPDATE} = update op * {@link #TYPE_DELETE} = delete op * @hide *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: TYPE_UPDATE
variables.comment:
* One of the possible values for the above column "type". Indicates it is an update op.
         * @hide

variables.name: TYPE_DELETE
variables.comment:
* One of the possible values for the above column "type". Indicates it is a delete op.
         * @hide

variables.name: NEW_READ_STATUS
variables.comment:
* This column contains a non-null value only if the operation on sms table is an update op * and the column "read" is changed by the update op. *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

* @hide
